Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly exceptional and has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. It comes with a range of features designed to enhance your daily experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than $120 to you. For this unique opportunity, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on providing top-tier products to our customers. I trust that you will find immense value in this product, just as many others have before. Please let me know if you're interested in making this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
